adText: Book your ticket now and travel safely!

bookOnline.title: Book Your Bus Ticket Online
bookOnline.description: Reserve your bus tickets quickly and securely from anywhere in Rwanda, without waiting in line.

trackBus.title: Track Your Bus in Real Time
trackBus.description: Know exactly where your bus is before it arrives at your stop for a stress-free journey.

easyUse.title: Easy to Use on All Platforms
easyUse.description: Our app and website are designed for everyone, whether on desktop, tablet, or mobile.

footer.tagline: Experience safe and comfortable travel across Rwanda. We connect you to every destination with reliability and care.
footer.bookDescription: Reserve your seat for a comfortable journey across Rwanda.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to get special offers and travel updates.
